title: Fauset and Photo of NAACP Flag - identify concepts

content.question: Which of the following best explains the presence of the flag hanging from the NAACP headquarters in Source 2?

choices.label: African Americans established Black churches to promote leadership opportunities for Black activists, musicians, and political leaders.
African Americans began to advocate for themselves politically as racial violence and atrocities continued through the early twentieth century.
African Americans began to protest discrimination and segregation in education through Black Greek-letter organizations.
African Americans advocated for the rights of Black women during the Womenâ€™s Suffrage movement of the early twentieth century.

content.answer: African Americans began to advocate for themselves politically as racial violence and atrocities continued through the early twentieth century.

topic.text: 3.11: The New Negro Movement and the Harlem Renaissance

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
